item.title: Mapping Census Data (ACS) Tutorial
item.description: Mapping ACS Data Leaflet is one of my favorite packages. The color choice brings me an unreasonable amount of joy, as do the slightly translucent city and street names. Itâ€™s a gorgeous design that makes maps look sleek and modern. So when my colleague, Jon Zadra, decided to map out preschool aged children for a project we are working on in Oregon, I got really excited.
